name: VITAMIN branding agency
tagline: Growth Agency. We will make you different
description:
VITAMIN branding agency - full-service advertising and marketing agency. We call it the main idea-oriented branch of our business. We create brands (brand concepts, naming, logos and corporate identity), carry out brands communication (strategy, B2C & B2B marketing packaging), consult on different issues and create ideas (for TV commercials, advertising layouts, any other interesting solutions).
Our passion is to work with digital solutions, starting from identifying key business problems, creating marketing strategy and UX design, then testing our ideas and making something that will work for you. Our employees have a big experience working in different fields of business with such brands as UNICREDIT BANK, DANONE, PORSHE UKRAINE, VOLKSWAGEN, AUDI, KYIVSTAR (biggest mobile operator in Ukraine), Lifecell (another mobile operator).
